Title: Relates to providing a patient of a residential health care facility essential caregiver visitation during COVID-19
Summary: Provides a patient of a residential health care facility essential caregiver visitation during COVID-19 to provide essential care to such patient.
LawCode: Add ยง2801-h, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to providing a patient of a residential health care facility essential caregiver visitation during the COVID-19 state disaster emergency
